reviewText: One of the "bonus" movies is the acclaimed 1971 TV mvoie "The Forgotten Man," starring Dennis Weaver, Anne Francis, Pamelyn Ferdin, Lois Nettleton, and Percy Rodrigues, one of the first films to tackle the issue of PTSD in returning Vietnam veterans.

4 stars only because my brother was POW in this war and is portrayed by of the actors. He received A LOT of ribbing at his squadron when this Made For TV movie came out. I bought this as a gag gift to spring on him for the July 4th holiday.
